name: Naruto: Shippuuden
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: One Piece
description: Gol D. Roger was known as the 'Pirate King',the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line. The capture and death of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world. His last words before his death revealed the existence of the greatest treasure in the world, One Piece. It was this revelation that brought about the Grand Age of Pirates, men who dreamed of finding One Piece—which promises an unlimited amount of riches and fame—and quite possibly the pinnacle of glory and the title of the Pirate King.

name: Attack on Titan
description: Centuries ago, mankind was slaughtered to near extinction by monstrous humanoid creatures called titans, forcing humans to hide in fear behind enormous concentric walls. What makes these giants truly terrifying is that their taste for human flesh is not born out of hunger but what appears to be out of pleasure. To ensure their survival, the remnants of humanity began living within defensive barriers, resulting in one hundred years without a single titan encounter. However, that fragile calm is soon shattered when a colossal titan manages to breach the supposedly impregnable outer wall, reigniting the fight for survival against the man-eating abominations.

name: Monster
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: Death Note
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: Violet Evergarden
description: There are words Violet heard on the battlefield, which she cannot forget. These words were given to her by someone she holds dear, more than anyone else. She does not yet know their meaning.A certain point in time, in the continent of Telesis. The great war which divided the continent into North and South has ended after four years, and the people are welcoming a new generation.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger.

name: Black Clover
description: Asta and Yuno were abandoned at the same church on the same day. Raised together as children, they came to know of the Wizard King—a title given to the strongest mage in the kingdom—and promised that they would compete against each other for the position of the next Wizard King. However, as they grew up, the stark difference between them became evident. While Yuno is able to wield magic with amazing power and control, Asta cannot use magic at all and desperately tries to awaken his powers by training physically.

name: Sword Art Online
description: In the year 2022, virtual reality has progressed by leaps and bounds, and a massive online role-playing game called Sword Art Online (SAO) is launched. With the aid of NerveGear technology, players can control their avatars within the game using nothing but their own thoughts.

name: Nanatsu no Taizai
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: Kiseijuu: Sei no Kakuritsu
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: Hunter x Hunter (2011)
description: It has been two and a half years since Naruto Uzumaki left Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village, for intense training following events which fueled his desire to be stronger. Now Akatsuki, the mysterious organization of elite rogue ninja, is closing in on their grand plan which may threaten the safety of the entire shinobi world.

name: Detective Conan
description: Shinichi Kudou, a high school student with an astounding talent for detective work, is transformed into a child after being poisoned by mysterious criminals. Adopting the alias Conan Edogawa, he continues solving cases while seeking a cure, all while hiding his true identity from those around him—including his childhood friend and love interest, Ran Mouri.

name: Spy x Family
description: In order to maintain peace between rival nations, a master spy codenamed Twilight must infiltrate an elite school. To do this, he creates a fake family: a wife who’s secretly an assassin, and a child who can read minds. Together, they form an unusual yet oddly wholesome family navigating secrets and danger on all sides.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuuji Itadori is an ordinary high schooler who one day finds himself entangled in the world of curses—malevolent entities born of negative human emotions. After swallowing a cursed object to save his friends, he becomes the host of a powerful and dangerous curse. Enrolled in the Tokyo Metropolitan Jujutsu Technical High School, he learns to battle curses while bearing the burden of the one he carries.

name: Erased
description: Struggling manga artist Satoru Fujinuma possesses an involuntary ability known as 'Revival', which sends him back in time moments before a life-threatening event occurs. When he’s wrongfully accused of murder, Satoru is sent back 18 years into the past, giving him a chance to prevent a childhood tragedy and change the course of his life.

name: Mob Psycho 100
description: Kageyama Shigeo, nicknamed 'Mob', is a powerful psychic who suppresses his emotions to keep his powers in check. Despite wanting a normal life, Mob finds himself involved in bizarre encounters with spirits, cults, and rival psychics. With his master Reigen—a self-proclaimed exorcist with no real powers—Mob navigates the complexity of power, emotion, and personal growth.

name: Steins;Gate
description: Self-proclaimed mad scientist Rintarou Okabe spends his days inventing strange gadgets with his lab mates in a tiny apartment. One day, they accidentally discover that their microwave can send text messages to the past. As they delve deeper into this accidental invention, they find themselves entangled in a dangerous conspiracy involving SERN, time travel, and the fragility of fate.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: After a disastrous failed attempt to bring their mother back to life using alchemy, Edward and Alphonse Elric pay a terrible price. Edward loses his leg, and Alphonse his entire body. Edward manages to save his brother's soul by sacrificing his arm and binding it to a suit of armor. Equipped with mechanical prosthetics and fueled by their goal to restore what they’ve lost, the brothers embark on a journey to obtain the Philosopher's Stone—an alchemical artifact said to amplify one's powers enormously.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou Kamado has taken it upon himself to support his family. Though living in poverty, the Kamado family leads a relatively peaceful and happy life. One day, Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered by demons, with only his sister Nezuko surviving—now transformed into a demon herself. Determined to avenge his family and cure his sister, Tanjirou joins the Demon Slayer Corps to hunt down the demons plaguing his land.

name: Cowboy Bebop
description: In a futuristic space-western setting, a crew of bounty hunters aboard the spaceship Bebop chase fugitives across the solar system, blending noir, jazz, and action elements to explore themes of loneliness and redemption.

name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
description: Exiled prince Lelouch Lamperouge obtains the supernatural power of Geass and leads a masked rebellion against the Holy Britannian Empire, commanding mecha battles and political intrigue in an alternate timeline.

name: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where superpowers called "Quirks" are common, Quirkless Izuku Midoriya inherits the legendary power One For All and enrolls at U.A. High School to train as the next Symbol of Peace.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: An anime adaptation of Hirohiko Araki’s manga, produced by David Production; it follows the Joestar family across generations as they combat supernatural threats using psychic manifestations called Stands.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A mecha anime series directed by Hideaki Anno and produced by Gainax and Tatsunoko Production; set fifteen years after a global cataclysm, teenagers pilot giant biomechanical units to fight mysterious beings called Angels.
